thoughts.text: Now that we have the URLs for articles on the US debt ceiling, it might be useful to get a text summary of each article. We can use the 'get_text_summary' command to achieve this.
thoughts.reasoning: Getting a text summary of each article on the US debt ceiling will help us quickly understand the key points of each article without having to read the entire article. The 'get_text_summary' command is a good option for this task.
